HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo in the top left corner, navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page of the featured product.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum and wet cleaners product category.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier product category.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones product category.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting product category.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Verify the page title contains 'Dyson India'
Verify the Dyson logo is visible
Verify the 'Search products and parts' search box is present
Verify the 'Shop now' button is visible
Verify the 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI' text is visible
